entry.title: I 10 peggiori film presenti attualmente su Netflix

entry.title: Chris Rock dopo un mese si esprime sullo schiaffo di Will Smith: «Sono guarito da tagli e lividi»
entry.summary: Se c’è una cosa che sta sorprendendo tutti nel mondo dello spettacolo, quella è la gestione del post-schiaffo da parte di Chris Rock. entry.title: Record Store Day 2022 Was a Triumph in Stores and Online
entry.summary: Record Store Day 2022 was a celebration for the ages. With COVID-19 restrictions being lifted in most places, the annual event’s focus of bringing more people into record stores was back in full swing. According to shops like Portland, Oregon’s Music Millennium, it was one of the single most successful days in their 53-year history. […] The post Record Store Day 2022 Was a Triumph in Stores and Online appeared first on Discogs Blog.
